help.description: Specifies details for the Help section.

location.description: Relative path or URL to the help directory, which contains the help content and images. Markdown files must be named for the language they support, e.g. en.md, fr.md. Images must be placed in a subfolder named images.

northarrow.description: Provides configuration to the northarrow fixture.

arrowIcon.description: The graphical icon url/data url of the north arrow.

poleIcon.description: The graphical icon url/data url of the north pole that replaces north arrow when it's on north pole

overviewmap.description: Provides the configuration to the overviewmap fixture

basemaps.description: Key-value dictionary where the key is the tile schema id and the value is a basemap. Can provide an overriding basemap for each tile schema in the main map config.

expandFactor.description: The ratio of the overview map's extent size compared to the main map's extent size

borderColour.description: The hex code representing the area rectangle border colour.

borderWidth.description: The pixel width of the area rectangle border

areaColour.description: The hex code representing the area rectangle colour.

areaOpacity.description: The opacity value of the area rectangle. Accepts decimal values between 0 and 1.

scrollguard.description: Provides the configuration to the scrollguard fixture

enabled.description: Indicates if the scrollguard should be active

areas-of-interest.description: Provides the configuration to the areas of interest fixture

areas.description: The areas to be displayed in the areas of interest fixture

items.description: The configuration for an area of interest

title.description: The title for this area of interest

thumbnail.description: The URL or base64 for the image to be used as the thumbnail graphic for this area of interest

description.description: Optional description blurb for this area of interest

extent.description: The map extent for this area of interest

appbar.description: Provides configuration to the appbar fixture. If not supplied, the default appbar controls are displayed.

items.description: Items that are displayed on the appbar, such as buttons linked to map components, formatters, images, etc.

oneOf.description: Specifies a panel ID to create a linked button for.
Specifies an appbar component with possibility of custom options.

options.description: Optional additional properties to customize the appbar component.

oneOf.description: A sub array of appbar items.
Specifies a panel ID to create a linked button for.
Specifies an appbar component with possibility of custom options.

options.description: Optional additional properties to customize the appbar component.

details.description: Provides layer-specific configuration to the details fixture.

name.description: Display name of the identified layer

template.description: Custom Vue component to render as details template

geosearch.description: Provides configuration to the geosearch fixture.

serviceUrls.description: Set of urls for lookup services. Aligns with GeoGratis APIs.

categories.description: Filter the search results based on the type of the geographical names. Allowed values can be found here (if using the Canadian GeoNames Search Service API): http://geogratis.gc.ca/services/geoname/en/codes/concise. Street address type ('ADDR') is also valid.

sortOrder.description: The sort order of the defined 'categories'. Any missing categories are appended to the bottom of the sorted list. The results can still be sorted through this option even if there are no categories being filtered.

disabledSearchTypes.description: Disable specific types of searches (NTS, FSA, or LAT/LNG).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return per request. The Canadian GeoNames Search Service API has a 1000 search limit which will be used as an upper limit of results returned unless another service is being used with a higher limit. The default is 100 results.

officialOnly.description: Whether to return only official names for the geographic names. Default is false which will return both official names and formerly official names.

legend.description: Provides configuration to the legend fixture.

panelWidth.description: Determines the width of provided panels. If a number, then defaults all panels for the fixture to the number.

sectionItem.description: A legend item not bound to a layer, used only for grouping legend items or displaying info sections.

content.description: Actual content of the section - description of title/text, URL to image file, or HTML for template.

layerItem.description: A single legend item bound to a layer.

layerId.description: Id a layer defined in the layers section of config.

sublayerIndex.description: Index of the 'sublayer' in the case of a map image layer.

coverIcon.description: An optional icon used to represent the layer.

description.description: Optional description displayed above the symbology stack when it is expanded.

symbologyRenderStyle.description: An optional style, describes how the symbology stack should be rendered.

symbologyExpanded.description: Indicates if symbology stack is expand by default

legendItem.description: Config for common properties present in all legend item types.

name.default: Layer name for layer items. Undefined for section items.

hidden.description: Indicates that the legend item will be hidden from the UI.

expanded.description: Specifies if the legend item is expanded by default.

exclusive.description: Specifies that children of this item form an exclusive set.

legendHeaderControls.description: All possible controls to show in the legend header.

legendItemControls.description: All possible controls to be enabled/disabled on a legend item.

layerControls.description: All possible controls to be enabled/disabled on a single legend layer item. Defaults to controls/disabledControls defined in layer config if missing.

symbologyStack.description: A collection of image-label pairings making up a layer's symbology stack.

image.description: Either a data URI or a URL to a source that supports CORS headers.

sqlQuery.description: An SQL where clause by which the map and datatable attributes can be filtered. All the query results for the symbologyStack should cover all attributes for that layer.

mapnav.description: Provides configuration to the map navigation bar fixture. If not supplied the default mapnav buttons are shown.

zoomOption.description: Specifies between zoom buttons or zoom sliders.

items.description: Map navigation buttons displayed on mapnav.

exportComponent.description: Provides configuration for an export fixture component. If not supplied the default config used.

selected.description: Indicates if this component is selected.

selectable.description: Indicates if this component is selectable.

export.description: Provides configuration to the export fixture. If not supplied the default config used.

value.description: The value of the title text.

mapElements.description: Configuration for the north arrow and scale bar.

columnWidth.description: Value in pixels to be used as the column width for the exported legend.

footnote.description: Configuration for the footnote. Currently not supported.

value.description: The value of the footnote text.

timestamp.description: Configuration for the timestamp. Currently not supported.

fileName.description: The filename of the exported image.

layerList.description: List of defined layers to be displayed, added to the map in the same order it appears in this list.

drawOrder.description: Attribute fields used to control drawing order on the map for vector features. Note ESRI currently only supports one field.

items.description: Draw order for one attribute field.

field.description: Layer field name contianing the value to order by.

ascending.description: Direction to order in. True means smaller values are on top of larger values. False is the opposite.

basicLayer.description: Properties describing a generic layer type that can represent an ESRI tile/image layer.

id.description: Identification of the layer for referencing within the viewer (does not relate directly to any external service).

url.description: Service endpoint of the layer. It should match the type provided in layerType.

refreshInterval.description: The automatic refresh interval of the layer in minutes. Maximum interval is 100 minutes. Currently not supported.

expectedDrawTime.description: The time span (in milliseconds) after which a 'slow-to-draw' notification is shown for any drawing layer. Zero will disable notifications.

expectedLoadTime.description: The time span (in milliseconds) after which a 'slow-to-load' notification is shown for any loading layer. Zero will disable notifications.

wmsSublayer.description: A child entry of a WMS layer.

id.description: Identification of the layer name in the WMS.

name.description: A descriptive name for the layer. To be used in the legend.

styleLegends.description: List of map of all styles to legend graphic URL for layer entry in the WMS. Overrides the URLs from the WMS service. Mappings to non-default styles are currently not supported.

url.description: The URL to the legend graphic.

currentStyle.description: Current style for the layer entry in the WMS. Currently not supported.

layerFixtureConfig.description: Fixture configuration that is specific to a layer.

toggleSymbology.description: Allows individual symbols to have visibility toggled on/off.

layerMetadata.description: Metadata link and name of the layer service.

url.description: Metadata url of the layer service.

name.description: Name to be displayed as the header of the metadata panel.
Specifies the field name to use to link to the identifier. Must exist in the layer.

alias.description: Specifies the field title. If missing, attempts to use the service alias, then defaults to the field name.

fieldMetadata.description: Specifies options for the fields of a layer.

exclusiveFields.description: If true, only fields in fieldInfo are recognized and downloaded. Otherwise, all fields are used.

opacity.description: Initial opacity value of layer. Accepts decimal values between 0 and 1.

visibility.description: Initial visibility of layer on map.

identify.description: Specifies whether or not to allow identify requests.

hovertips.description: Specifies whether or not to disable hovertips.

columns.description: An array to specify how the columns (properties) of the table are defined. If a column is not present in the array, it is treated as disabled. If the property is not defined, all layer attributes will be shown using default values.

search.description: Whether global search is enabled by default.

searchFilter.description: Specifies the default filter to apply to a table (for global search).

showFilter.description: Specifies if the column filters are displayed on table load.

applyToMap.description: Specifies if column filters are applied to the map by default.

filterByExtent.description: Specifies if the table should filter rows by extent by default.

column.description: Specifies column properties. The ordering of columns in the table header is the same as the order they appear in this array.

field.description: Unique identifier for the column. Aligns with the layer field name.

title.description: Column title, uses the layer column name or alias if missing.

visible.description: Specifies if column is visible by default.

width.description: Specifies the column width. The default maximum column width is 400px.

sort.description: Specifies if column requires to be sorted, either in ascending, descending, or no order.

searchable.description: Specifies if column filter is available.

filter.description: Specifies the filter properties for a column.

type.description: Specifies the filter type to use for a column. Defaults to being filtered as a string.

value.description: Specifies the initial filter value for string or selector types.

min.description: Specifies the initial lower bound filter value for number or date types.

max.description: Specifies the initial upper bound filter value for number or date types.

static.description: Specifies if column filter is modifiable.

tileSchema.description: A unique combination of an LOD and an extent set (each basemap must fit into a tile schema).

id.description: A unique id identifying a tile schema (combination of an extent set and a zoom scale).

name.description: The name to display in the basemap selector for the set of basemaps referencing this schema.

extentSetId.description: Identification link to extent set data defined in map.extentSets.

lodSetId.description: Identification link to lod set data defined in map.lodSets.

thumbnailTileUrls.description: The list of two horizontally-adjacent tile URLs used to create the basemap thumbnail. URLs take the form of '/tile/<LOD_ID>/<VERTICAL_TILE_INDEX>/<HORIZONTAL_TILE_INDEX>'.

hasNorthPole.description: Indicates if this tile schema shows the north pole.

basemap.description: Properties of a basemap to be displayed in the basemap selector panel.

id.description: A unique identifier for the basemap.

name.description: Name of the basemap used for labeling.

description.description: Description of the basemap. Becomes visible when basemap selector is expanded.

altText.description: Alt text for the basemap thumbnail image.

hideThumbnail.description: When enabled, hides the basemap thumbnail image, leaving just the text component.

thumbnailUrl.description: Path to image file to display in the basemap selector.

tileSchemaId.description: The tile schema associated with this basemap.

layers.description: A set of URLs which should be composited to form a basemap entry. Stacked in ascending order, i.e. the first layer sits at the bottom and the last layer at the top

attribution.description: Custom attribution and logo for associated basemap when selected.

disabled.description: Specifies if basemap attribution text is disabled.

value.description: Contains the attribution value. If empty, it will use copyright text from the server.

disabled.description: Specifies if basemap attribution logo is disabled.

link.description: URL to go to when clicked.

extentSet.description: Configuration for all required extent properties.

id.description: Identification for extent set that is mainly referenced by a tile schema.

full.description: The full extent; default will be used if not supplied.

maximum.description: The maximum extent; full or default extents will be used if not supplied.

extent.description: Map extent defined by min/max xy-coordinates.

extentWithReference.description: Map extent defined by min/max xy-coordinates and spatial reference.

spatialReference.description: Spatial reference properties to help define map projection.

wkid.description: A well known ESRI id denoting a projection.

latestWkid.description: A well known ESRI id denoting a projection.

wkt.description: A well known type projection definition.

lodSet.description: Details for a specific tile schema.

id.description: Identification for a lod set that is mainly referenced by a tile schema.

lods.description: Level of details for a tile schema (i.e., zoom scales).

version.description: The schema version used to validate the configuration file. The schema should enumerate the list of versions accepted by this version of the viewer.

fixtures.description: Optional configuration for required map fixtures. TODO: fixtures may not exist so cannot enforce fixtures in config file

legend.description: Provides configuration to legend. If not supplied, a blank legend is displayed.

appbar.description: Provides configuration to the appbar. If not supplied, default appbar controls are displayed.

mapnav.description: Provides configuration to the appbar. If not supplied, default appbar controls are displayed.

geosearch.description: Provides configuration to geosearch. If not supplied, default geosearch services are used.

details.description: Provides default template configuration to the details fixture. If not supplied, RAMP default templates wil be used.

templates.description: Specifies a custom Vue component to render as the default details template for each identify result format.

help.description: Specifies details for the Help section

northarrow.description: Provides configuration to the north arrow and pole marker

overviewmap.description: Provides the configuration to the overviewmap fixture

scrollguard.description: Provides the configuration to the scrollguard fixture

hilight.description: Provides configuration to the map's highlighter

mode.description: The hilight mode to use. The default mode is glow.

options.description: Options for the selected hilight mode.

onOpacity.description: Opacity of the fog that obscures non-highlighted features when a feature is highlighted. Applies to fog hilight mode.

offOpacity.description: Opacity of the fog that obscures non-highlighted features when no feature is highlighted. Applies to fog hilight mode.

areas-of-interest.description: Provides configuration to the areas of interest fixture

open.description: The panels to open on startup. Panels with props are currently not supported.

id.description: The ID of the panel to open.

screen.description: The ID of the screen of the panel to show.

pin.description: Whether to pin the panel as well (in addition to opening).

layers.description: Layer list in the order which they should be added to the map. Defaults to no layers.

tileSchemas.description: Combinations of LOD and extent sets for the map.

extentSets.description: The default, full and maximum extents of the map.

lodSets.description: The levels of detail (zoom scales) available for the map.

initialBasemapId.description: Initial basemap to load. If not supplied, viewer will select a default basemap.

basemaps.description: A list of basemaps to be made available via the basemap selector.

caption.description: Configuration for the components in the map caption bar

formatter.description: ID of the initial mouse point formatter

pointZoomScale.description: The zoom level when zooming to a point feature (e.g. when using the zoom button in the datagrid). Should be a positive integer.

mapMouseThrottle.description: The amount of throttling (in milliseconds) to be used for the map mouse move event. A value of 0 means no throttle.

proxyUrl.description: An optional proxy to be used for dealing with same-origin issues.  URL must either be a relative path on the same server or an absolute path on a server which sets CORS headers. Applies only to map services.

animate.description: Will enable visual animation when using the site, such as control transitions.
